About Us
About Us
Family owned & operated
Hi and welcome to our restaurant.  BJ's Grill has been a lifelong dream of Brandon's. In 2018, Brandon and Jennifer had the opportunity relocate from their home state oF Tennessee to Chipley, Florida. Within a matter of month they had found the perfect home and the perfect place to open BJ's Grill.  Since opening in 2018 we have continued to thrive. Our daughters, Lillie and Audrey enjoy being active in our community and school.  We now have a mini farm just outside of town and enjoy our downtime tending to our goats, chickens, cats, dog and calf.
We hope you enjoy your experience here at BJ's Grill and we look forward  to continuing to serve the Chipley and surrounding areas with great food, service, laughter and LOVE!
Breakfast Time
Come hungry when you join us for breakfast.  Our menu is A La Carte.  Which means you only order what you want! Everything is cooked to order when you eat at BJ's Grill.
Fresh Ingredients
Casual shouldn't mean stale food options. Great taste is the name of the game, and we're committed to stepping up to the plate. We are dedicated to providing fresh options for our customers. Our burgers are hand patted and cooked to order when you order them! Then build your burger exactly the way you want it!
Stay Awhile or Grab & Run
Have time to sit in? We have plenty of space inside our dining room.  Or place a to-go order and take it with you! Order ahead on our online app! Either way we are sure you will enjoy your visit with us here at BJ's Grill and we look forward to serving you!
Connect With Us
Visit our Facebook
Visit our Instagram
Visit our Yelp

What People Are Saying
What People Are Saying
★★★★★
Felt welcomed. Food was good. Price was decent. Seemed pretty clean. Will definitely be going back. Overall good experience here.
-Audrie Flowers
★★★★★
Travel to see friends in chipley FL. We always make a point to grab lunch here awesome people and great food and service highly recommended
-John Jenkins III
★★★★★
A favorite evening place of mine. I had a brother come into town and he asked me to go back here. I see why this place has a lot of good reviews.
-Ashley26P
★★★★★
What a find with this little hole in the wall. Lots of really good food for a great price. The atmosphere was fun and the wait staff did a fantastic job. Clean restrooms and lots of food to choose from. One of my favorite finds!
-Southern Family Matters
Write a Review
Order Now
